pages.text:
Manure Chickens are a species of dung chickens. They are absolutely filthy, sticky to the touch and have a very distinct, objectively unpleasant smell. Even though they're repulsive, there is a lot of potential behind their stink.
Lay Item: Chicken Manure.$(br2)All chickens shed Manure passively while freely roaming, but you can use these to industrialize its production.
